Text:
Here is my request for someone to host Carol For Another Christmas  on You Tube and let me know if you do.  I do not know how that is done.

loninappleton

Talent abounds in this unusual telling of the Dickens classic (one of the high points of the production is the score by Henry Mancini), and in the absence of a formal release in the studio quality evident in the TCM showing in December 2012, this is very welcome! A=6; V=7.
